Indira Devi Bawri (born 1 October 1987) is an Indian politician. A member of the Rashtriya Loktantrik Pary, Bawri served as the Member of the Rajasthan Legislative Assembly representing Merta from 2018 to 2023. She also served as member of committee on welfare of Scheduled Castes in the Rajasthan Legislative Assembly.
